description: Expansion of Product_{k >= 1} 1/(1-x^k)^c(k), where c(1), c(2), ... = 2 3 2 3 2 3 2 3 ....
links: Vaclav Kotesovec, A method of finding the asymptotics of q-series based on the convolution of generating functions, arXiv:1509.08708 [math.CO], Sep 30 2015, p. 16.
formula: Euler transform of period 2 sequence [ 2, 3, ...].a(n) ~ 5 * exp(sqrt(5*n/3)*Pi) / (48 * n^(3/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 20 2015
mathematica: nmax = 50; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 + x^k)*(1 - x^k)^3), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 20 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( 1 / (eta(x + A)^2 * eta(x^2 + A)), n))};
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
